alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 4:58AM EST until February 18 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... North Fork Kentucky River at Hazard affecting Perry County. North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson affecting Breathitt County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE TONIGHT... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson. * WHEN...From this morning to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Water begins inundating Wolverine Road just north of the Hays Depot bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 AM EST Friday the stage was 23.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 30.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 30.0 feet on 04/29/1970. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 4 PM EST Friday.
